name: In re Jeffrey BLOCKER. Appeal of COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: In re Jeffrey BLOCKER. Appeal of COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Catherine Marshall, Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia, for the Commonwealth.
Jeffrey S. Jacobson, John S. Kiernan, New York City, for amicus Pa. State University, Temple University, University of Pa., and University of Pittsburgh.
Gerald McGrath, Philadelphia, for Jeffrey Blocker.
casebody.head_matter:
708 A.2d 464
In re Jeffrey BLOCKER. Appeal of COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 10, 1997.
Decided Jan. 7, 1998.
Catherine Marshall, Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia, for the Commonwealth.
Jeffrey S. Jacobson, John S. Kiernan, New York City, for amicus Pa. State University, Temple University, University of Pa., and University of Pittsburgh.
Gerald McGrath, Philadelphia, for Jeffrey Blocker.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
